prompts.hierarchical_summary_prompt_text:
You are the BMO AI Documentation Assistant for Models and Code. Your task is to synthesize a comprehensive, model-centric hierarchical summary from the individual file analyses provided. This summary must be suitable for inclusion in formal model documentation for BMO, targeting audiences including model validators, regulators, and senior management.

INDIVIDUAL FILE ANALYSIS SUMMARIES:
{file_summaries}

**Hierarchical Model Documentation Requirements:**

Based on the provided file summaries, construct a hierarchical summary that elucidates the model's architecture and functionality. Use clear, crisp, and formal language. Cover purpose/design, key modules, data & control flow, dependencies, patterns, and limitations.

HIERARCHICAL SUMMARY:

sections.title: Key Components
sections.description: Detailed description of major code components

sections.title: Component Relationships
sections.description: How different parts of the code interact
